Let your heart be stolen by Beeyoutiful®'s BanditoBlend and Rollerball! It isn't your average robbers' blend: we think it is better! Derived from a mixture of botanicals dating back to the 1800's, this intricate essential oil blend has been carefully constructed to win a prized place in your heart and home. Available in both undiluted for diffusing and other aromatherapy applications or pre-diluted for topical use, mixed with Jojoba Oil in a convenient ready-to-use rollerball. Frankincense, Cinnamon, Clove, Lemon, Rosemary, and Eucalyptus Essential Oils are combined to create a blend that can be used to boost immunity and to help protect against illnesses. The vibrant and spicy aroma tantalizes the senses and can aid in stimulating the immune system and supporting respiratory health. - Frankincense Boswellia carteri - supports respiratory health, antimicrobial also analgesic - Lemon Citrus limon - cleans and sanitizes, and provides a light citrusy tone - Rosemary Rosemarinus officinalis - antimicrobial, supports respiratory health - Eucalyptus Eucalyptus globulus - antimicrobial, supports healthy immune system and respiratory system. Bandito Blend Rollerball is ready-to-use and fits conveniently in your bag or purse! Combining Frankincense, Rosemary, Cinnamon, Clove, Eucalyptus and Lemon Essential Oils in a rich base of Jojoba Oil to create a treasured oil that supports the immune system. Suggested use: Apply on the bottom of feet, down the spine and neck. Note: Bandito Rollerball should NOT be used on children under 10 years old. Bandito should never be used internally.
